description:
Tokio and Calen travel back to the Bakumatsu Era of Japan to find out the True History about the Shinsengumi. When they get there, rather than seeing a group of brave samurai ready to cut down those who oppose the shogunate, they find a bunch of guys wearing masks, running away from girls. Apparently the Shinsengumi was a group of hot guys who were too deathly shy to show their faces in public.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Shinsengumi Was Actually a _________ Group!
新撰組は人○○集団だった!
